name: overviewer-configurator
description: An UI wrapper for Overviewer that handles everything from map configuration to actually running it

scripts.reset-deps: npm un @mdi/font adm-zip axios chart.js command-exists electron-window-state gunzip-maybe jquery material-design-icons rimraf tar-fs typeface-open-sans typeface-open-sans-condensed electron electronmon less-watch-compiler electron-packager electron-winstaller && npm i @mdi/font adm-zip axios chart.js command-exists electron-window-state gunzip-maybe jquery material-design-icons rimraf tar-fs typeface-open-sans typeface-open-sans-condensed && npm i -D electron@13 electronmon less-watch-compiler && npm i -O electron-packager electron-winstaller

author: demosjarco
